data.text: 所以到2023年The Body Shop再被卖掉 and现在2024年英国的Body Shop又再被卖
data.reasoning: Reports historical and current events of company sales. These are verifiable occurrences.

data.text: 这个私募基金是不是想分拆来卖掉他的业务呢

data.text: 英国的Body Shop属于天然的这个化妆品或者是护肤品的这个品牌他在英国宣布bankruptcy要倒闭哦
data.reasoning: States the bankruptcy of The Body Shop in the UK. This is a verifiable event.

data.text: 马来西亚我们这边呢就有一个上市公司呢是拥有马来西亚还有Vietnam越南以及Cambodia柬埔寨的美体小店The Body Shop的特许经营权了

data.text: 很多投资者尤其是从价值投资的角度去思考的朋友们呢就会来想老师这样子的话是不是他会跌到过了龙以及跌出了价值
data.reasoning: Describes the thought process of value investors, which is a subjective interpretation of market conditions and stock valuation.

data.text: InNature assures its business as usual even as The Body Shop UK teeters towards bankruptcy
data.reasoning: Reports a statement made by InNature, a verifiable communication.

data.text: InNature的股价2月14号股价当日下跌13.6%当时候股价突然间这样子掉下来而且是放量成交量跟着放大来下跌令到市场呢相当恐慌一下子
data.reasoning: Reports specific stock market data and the resulting market reaction. These are quantifiable events.

data.text: 股价稍微略有回升罢了并没有特别持久到我们今天录制这个视频的2月28号股价又跌回去2月14号的收市价
data.reasoning: Reports stock price movements over time, verifiable data.

data.text: 辟谣带来的股价略为回升的效果呢已经好像没有作用了

data.text: MCO的时候大家都不能够去逛街都lockdown在家了所以Shopping mall的人潮大幅度减少这个公司的生意一定是大幅度受到影响所以他毫无疑问的一上市就跌破了IPO价格
data.reasoning: Describes the impact of lockdown measures on retail businesses, a verifiable cause-and-effect relationship.
